participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Evelyn enjoys solitude and values creativity. She's empathetic and believes in the importance of personal growth.
participant_1.background: I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing. I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to. I work as a trauma surgeon. My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures. I own a Chevy Tahoe.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is a bit anxious but has a good heart. He often worries about his relationships and strives to improve them. He enjoys the little things in life, like snacks and fashion.
participant_2.background: I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow. My wife doesn’t like me anymore. I love to snack between meals. I want to show off my new earrings to my friends. I am not close to my family but I want to be.

content.text: Good, good. Just getting ready for this baby shower tomorrow.
Oh fun! Are you excited to be a parent?
I am and I'm not. I'm scared of being a bad parent.
I'm sure you'll be great. My mom always told me that you don't need to be perfect, just try your best.
That's good advice. I'm just not sure what to do.
Well, what do you like to do?
I like to write and travel.
Maybe you could write a journal about your experiences as a parent?
That's a great idea! I love that.
I'm glad I could help. What are you looking for in a home?
I'm looking for something quiet with a view of the woods.
That sounds nice. I'd love to live in a place like that.
Me too. I'm hoping to move soon.
